extendedInfo.description: Easy Voice Recorder Pro is a fun, simple and easy to use audio & voice recorder. Use it to reliably record your meetings, personal notes, classes, and more, with no time limits or ads!Please note that Easy Voice Recorder cannot record phone calls on most phones, and may not be compatible with all devices. For more information, please see the help ( http://www.digipom.com/easy-voice-recorder-help/ ). If there are any problems, please contact us and we can troubleshoot the problem together.Main featuresâ Record to high-quality PCM and AAC, or use AMR to save space.â Share and manage your recordings easily, and back them up to your PC.â Record in the background and control the recorder with a home screen widget.You can also use powerful Jelly Bean audio filters on supported devices, rename and delete your recordings, save them as a ringtone, integrate with Tasker and Locale, and much more.Pro featuresHere are just some of the additional features, available on supported devices:â Record in stereo.â Record with a Bluetooth microphone.â Boost input volume with microphone software gain.â Skip silent parts.â Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.â Switch to the camcorder microphone for louder and clearer recordings.â Control the recorder from anywhere using the status bar. Recordings can also be pinned to the status bar.With many more enhancements and additions, and more to come in the future.Additional InfoIf you would like to help translate Easy Voice Recorder into your language, we would love to see you over at the translation project ( http://crowdin.net/project/easy-voice-recorder ). We also have a test group for alpha and beta testers ( https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/easy-voice-recorder-testing ).SupportPlease test using the free version before upgrading to pro. If there are any problems, please contact us and we can troubleshoot the problem together.Please note that Easy Voice Recorder cannot record phone calls on most phones. Some devices have known issues or may be incompatible, and recording quality varies between devices. If the app force-closes after an install or upgrade, your firmware may have corrupted the install. Please uninstall and reinstall if this happens.For more information, please see the help ( http://www.digipom.com/easy-voice-recorder-help/ ).Permission detailsRecord audio - Record audio from your microphone.Bluetooth, modify audio settings, sticky broadcasts - Support Bluetooth.Modify system settings - Support ringtones.Write to external storage - Save recordings to your external storage.Prevent phone from sleeping - Allow recordings to continue even with the screen turned off.Check license â Verify market license.

reviews.title: Good recorder app.
reviews.comment: Adding some basic editing features such as normalize volume in next update will definitely make the app from good to great.
reviews.author: Chris CK Chan

reviews.title: BT recording with Sena SMH-10 and Note 2 sounds bad
reviews.comment: App works well using the internal mic on my Note 2, but when trying to use my BT headset (Sena SMH-10) the audio sounds sounds very scratchy and distorted, and is unuseable
reviews.author: Nick Lucent

reviews.title: Latest update didn\'t fix my issues
reviews.comment: The problem of recordings not being able to be detected on the computer is still present.  Previous 3 updates recordings could be detected automatically without the need for a forced media scan.  A time consuming and hassle to do it.  Edit: would face occasionally audio recording loss.
reviews.author: Nicky Chong

reviews.title: It works well for me S3
reviews.comment: I record my class with it. Works lile a charm. Looks like my bug is gone ;-)
reviews.author: Eric Mathieu

reviews.title: Top notch
reviews.comment: Great app that has an intuitive layout, and appealing look. Also a top notch developer that releases frequent updates. Definitely a must have.
reviews.author: Greg Cahill

reviews.title: Terrible.poor audio quality
reviews.comment: Audio recording is not good at all.  Bluetooth recoding sounds like a garbled mess.  Do Not waste your money!!!
reviews.author: david lyndall

reviews.title: Easy to use and powerful.
reviews.comment: I tried many other recording apps before I found this on. Now Easy Voice Recorder is the only recording app on my phone. The gain control allows me to record audio that was not possible with other apps. The meter lets me know instantly if I have turned the gain up to much.  I love that I can adjust the gain in real time.
reviews.author: Paul Moss

reviews.title: i am writing a book with this nifty tool.
reviews.comment: i love it. it\'s the microphone for my heart to speak its mind. paired with dropbox, i have every word saved and shared if need be. i forget what i paid for the pro version, but I\'m sure it\'s not much and well worth it. the free version is great too, as i recall.  it\'d be a perfect digital diary.
reviews.author: Thomas A. Ollendorff

reviews.title: Unable to change file names
reviews.comment: Can\'t change file names with pro version S2
reviews.author: Rick Pineiro

reviews.title: SDXC recording
reviews.comment: The feature I\'ve asked for before came with the new versions, but now I have another issue. I\'ve installed new SDXC 64Gb card - provides exFAT and has no 4 Gb file size limitation. However, the application\'s behavior remains the same, like as the limitation is still persists. It displays an error message when the filesize becomes too big and stops recording. Please fix. Your appliction is the best.
reviews.author: Alex Bal

reviews.title: Does not record from bluetooth
reviews.comment: Waste of money. I wanted to record from my Bluetooth motorcycle helmet.
reviews.author: Mont Poindexter

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: And looks cool
reviews.author: naaman meir

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: I rarely rate apps. This one does what it says. I especially like the red button widget. Toggle between record and stop without notice. Works great!
reviews.author: Don Graham

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Great app, love everything about it
reviews.author: Travis Toombs

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Works well with s4 nice job!!!
reviews.author: Henry Golden

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great for class
reviews.author: Saul Veles

reviews.title: Awesome App - Missing 1 Feature
reviews.comment: Great app, I use it all the time on my Nexus\' 4 & 7. Just wish it had an auto-backup to Google Drive feature, for which I would then give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ev Delen

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Wish the app had a better built in player
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only records one side of a phone conversation on my s4. Any fixes for this?
reviews.author: Graig Ozey

reviews.title: No funciona v\303\255a Bluetooth - S3
reviews.comment: No es posible realizar grabaciones en un Galaxy S3 con un dispositivo Bluetooth Genius HS-905BT. Se queda \"conectando con el Bluetooth\" que de hecho ya esta emparejado con el celular.
reviews.author: Julian Pardo Cepeda
